_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Incredible and amazing qualities of Nand: She did not get upset when her son was executed
She did not get upset when her husband was reborn in one of the realms of spirits
She did not betray her husband even in thought
She did not deliberately break any precept
She can enter and remain in the first absorption
She can enter and remain in the second absorption
She can enter and remain in the third absorption
She can enter and remain in the fourth absorption
She has given up all five lower fetters taught by the Buddha.
